climbs.name: Pretty Fly for a White Guy

content.protection: Toprope off of the Superfly Anchors
content.location: Lower off of Superfly to the hillside below the trail and climb back up to the trail.

content.description:
The Not-So-Fly Wall is the short cliff just below the Superfly Wall. So far the only climb on this wall was established after being lowered to the hillside below to retrieve a dropped pair of sunglasses.  

  This resource is meant for those who want to add a little extra challenge to retrieving gear and apparel dropped from the trail above. All known ascents to do date have been established on toprope through the anchors of a climb on the Superfly Wall.
